website_summaries.verdict: This small, affordable magnetic cell phone mount secures your mobile device to almost any flat surface. Universal mount good for all devices, including those with wireless charging, with 360-degree rotation.
pros: The very strong, temperature-controlled magnet in this mount works with thin and thick phone cases, without any damage to your phone
Cradle-free for ease of placing, using and removing with one hand
We like the lifetime tech support and 3-year warranty
cons: Some users report problems with the adhesive that secures the mount to the car dash not being strong enough, and it may lose sticking power completely in hot weather
Need to use protective film, particularly for wireless charge devices

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY (keep looking)
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, weak design/construction, not durable. Noticed it getting loose after only 1 week of use, then broke about 2 months thereafter at the point where arm connects to the base, which is plastic (see pics). This is not acceptable material to be using at the part that is subject to relatively high torsional forces. You don't have to be an engineer to know that this is just simply piss poor design. I would advise avoiding this brand and consider something that is built to last more than a few short months.
customer_reviews.author: RM9K

customer_reviews.title: Best Scoshe mount
customer_reviews.text: I have had this same brand but different application in other vehicles. I like this the most by far for several reasons. -Does not require adhering to your dash -Suction cup to mount on glass and/or comes with a mount to stick to the dash -the mount arm flexes enough to provide best location while being sturdy enough for bumps or other vibrations to not affect location or mount. -I can remove and use in other vehicles without leaving behind residue or other materials from mounting on dash or other surface. I have had this for several weeks and won't use another brand or mounting device for my phone. because it is a suction cup forer a week
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Useless...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the dashboard, alcohol swabbed the dashboard, stuck it on the dashboard and held it down for minutes... Didn’t stick anything on it at all... Halfway through the day, went to check to see if it was secure...tapped it LIGHTLY and it fell right over. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! A MOUNT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! A MOUNT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS! I've bought so many magnet mounts; I am convinced I have single-handedly been funding R&D for the made in China magnet mount industry over the last ~12 months. I have tried everything - stick on, vent mount, CD mount etc - and they've all been JUNK. Don't hold the phone, come off too easy, bounce around, fall apart after a month etc. Until now. This one actually works. Been rock solid since Day 1 install, even with my super heavy, somewhat long in the tooth, aftermarket battery burdened mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do, but not in the place I originally wanted to mount it. The adhesive is alright. It had a bit of problems on the center of my dash, but I think that is due to the texture there. I had to mount it a bit off to the side where the surface was smoother. The magnet is also fairly strong, but I think i was spoiled by the previous mount we had (also a Scoshe) that had a REALLY strong magnet. We had bought the previous a couple of years back and we did not remove it when we traded out our previous vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Urduja

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick, falls off.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third mount. Other two stuck fine but it seems that the glue base on this one was different. The base came away from the bottom of the mount and will not stick back on. Very disappointed. Have you changed your glue formula? Update - Amazon took back the old one and shipped another. I stuck it on and now the MOUNT has fallen off of the glue. Scoosche you have changed something. The other two were great and now the last two we terrible! Going to send this back but I fear I will get move of the same.
customer_reviews.author: WeJammin!

customer_reviews.title: Place metal plate on outside of case!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and advocate for them with family members. That being said I have the exact Speck case pictured as being a good option for the metal plate to be magnetic through... having previously attached the magnet to the outside of the case and replacing the case every few months I gave it a shot. The phone now falls off whenever I touch it to do something with the GPS while driving. Very annoying. Do yourself a favor and put the plate on the outside of the case. They should include more than two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This certainly is not worth the plastic it was made with. The positioning of the device does not allow for adequate viewing while driving - either aspect - viewing the phone nor/or viewing the street. The curve is so low on it that if you have a larger phone (Note 8/A+) the phone will tilt and you won't be able to see the screen. I tried positioning on the device on the upper left windshield, in the center of the windshield under mirror, and on the dashboard. Ugh. I should not have thrown away the box. This may work with a smaller phone (I-4).
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Holds my phone well during off road adventures!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my Jeep and was skeptical it would hold my large iPhone 8 Plus at all while rock crawling and bouncing down dirt roads. My phone has only fell off the magnetic mount once in the 10+ times I have used it on off-road adventures, and the suction cup has yet to release from the window since I installed it. The long shaft from the suction cup to the mount bends as needed to adjust the angle of your phone, but is also very stiff and rigid. It holds the phone still during street driving, but does bounce around a bit when driving off-road. Overall, I am happy with this solution for my Jeep!
customer_reviews.author: Jacksje4

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet, discrete, 3M tape is very strong
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I really liked the fast delivery, ease of use, as well as the discreteness. Product came within a day, well packaged in a clamshell. Its easy to use, given 2 magnetic plates, the mount itself, as well as another clear double-sided backing tape if you don't want to damage your phone by sticking the magnet pieces directly to your phone. It is very small and currently i have it placed on the burlwood interior of my car. I don't know if it works on leather though. It is a strong magnet that can support the weight of an iPhone 6s +.
customer_reviews.author: Elson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Just be advised that it interferes with wireless charging.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet has a good, strong grip (you can use it with the Lumia 950 XL without the included plates, maybe even with other phones too). The goose neck is a little hard to articulate, but at least doesn't lose its position. Lastly, the suction cup appears to hold pretty well and at least can be re-washed if I have to reposition it. The only disadvantage is that the metal plate interferes with QI charging. If your phone is QI-equipped and you use it, make sure you DON'T attach the metal plate directly to your phone. If you're using a third party QI charging case, don't stick the plate anywhere until you test compatibility with your different charging pads.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is reasonably priced!  SEE UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: A suction type mount would not stick to ANYTHING on my 07 Miata. This was inexpensive so if it didn't work I figured I wouldn't be out much. It mounted securely to my dash. I used the larger metal plate because my case is a wallet. It sticks tightly to the magnet. I take some bumpy roads at higher speeds and the phone never moves a centimeter!! Buy it. You can't go wrong! Unfortunately the mount wouldn't stick to my smooth plastic dash and fell off after a few days leaving nasty goop behind.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Luoto

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this cell phone mount. I have a silicone case on my phone. I stuck the peel-n-stick magnets, what are thin but powerful, and it no issues with it started cling to the mount. The mount itself is well made. The neck is flexible but by no means dangly or limp. I have to force it to bend or turn—no problem at all. I prefer the magnetic mounts and won’t go back to the ones where you stuff your phone into a clamp. Comes off easily but stays on very well. If I go over train tracks it sometimes has fallen, but that’s driver’s fault. I would recommend this mount to anyone. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: The Daughter of a King

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Over a year and a half in Houston, Texas, and it is still stuck to my friend's window! She loves it, and it has proven to be very durable. The magnet is strong enough to where she didn't actually stick it on the phone case, but instead put it in-between the case and the phone. I tried the same thing with my otter-box, but unfortunately the case was too thick and it didn't work. Nevertheless, it is a quality product, easy to stick on, and an awesome thing to have all around. She has it to the left of her steering wheel mounted to the glass. 10/10 recommend, I got myself another similar SCOSCHE mount.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Arm is Getting Loose
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the arm is starting to wiggle a lot and I'm afraid it will snap off soon. I received the phone mount the 1st of August 2020 and have had it just over 1 month now. Way too soon to be breaking :( The suction works great and it was exactly what I was looking for, but would be better if the arm didn't wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Best phone holder I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong hold!!! Best holder I’ve ever used! There is a few drawbacks though, first if you have a case that has a flip cover, it will flop all over. Second you have to put a metal plate on your case or phone, you have to be careful where you put it, it will block wireless charging, it would be nice to see a wireless charger built into the mount so you don’t have to have cords everywhere! When it comes to takijg off the plate, the adhesive is very strong, so if you have to take it off it isn’t easy! In my case it resulted in a 2 hour visit to urgent care and 3 stitches.
customer_reviews.author: David Hochstein

customer_reviews.title: Holds iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my iPhone 8 Plus (to plug in cigarette lighter) and it works perfectly. I did not want to stick the magnet on my new phone, so I just placed it between my phone case and the phone and the magnetism was still strong enough to support the weight of the phone. Highly recommend. My car rides pretty rough and it hasn't fallen off once!
customer_reviews.author: M. LeighTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works good. I have a Otter Box case with the metal plate between the hard case and rubber cover, which makes for an okay strength but not as tight as when the plate is directly in contact with the mount. Not the mount's fault though; just because of the case that I have. My only negative is that the box says that there are 2 plates included, but there was only one. I double checked and pulled the box apart to make sure I did not miss it somewhere. I really would have liked the 2nd plate so I can use another phone (wife's) on the same mount.
customer_reviews.author: Boerseun

customer_reviews.title: I will revise later, my last review was the worst for this brand ever
customer_reviews.text: I just had a Scosche, and I there was a HUGE MISTAKE in their mounting. I am sure it was in in error, but waiting to see. The base did not provide adequate mounting for the device, and the device dropped off the desk. I have NEVER had this before with Scosche. Also, the mount was from wood, not a window, but I have ALWAYS bought from Scosche, and never had a problem, so I don't know what to make of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradjamc

customer_reviews.title: magnets are weak and adjustable mount angles are limited
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know, this is the only magnetic mount that has a horizontal base which is good for mounting on slim surfaces such as console trim neat the dashboard. I bought it specifically for my Tacoma since I didn't want to stick it on the dashboard and there's some trim around the AC vents that I wanted to stick this on. I ended up returning it because the magnets are not as strong as other mounts, and you can't tilt the pad/magnet down. The lowest setting is slightly facing upwards, or 100 degrees or so. I did not like that viewing angle when driving so it can be a distraction.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Unit falls off, poor adhesive pads?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of this and the company did send me a new unit which was nice. With that said I have the exact same problem, the adhesive sticks fine to my dash but the phone holder continually falls (with the phone) the bottom of the holder is very smooth so I tried sanding it thinking this might remedy my problem. Again it came loose (perhaps because the adhesive pad had been used before) I really want to make this work but I am fearful it will fall and break my $1099.09 IPhone X. Possibly a bad batch of adhesive pads from 3M, HELP !!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Floridian for Safe Driving Practices
customer_reviews.text: As a new resident in Florida I have to use a lot of GPS until I get the feel of where I am going, but I also traditionally hate car holders. So here I am somewhere between practicing safety and complaining about the quality of those things. After complaining to a friend she shared me the link to the SCHOSHE MAGWDM Magic Mount Magnetic Suction Cup Mount. That was one of the best things that I could have possibly purchased. The magnets are supper strong. It is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy and holds the phone very well
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy and holds the phone very well. Came with two different magnets to attach to the phone or case. It gets a three because the rubber grip is somewhat tight and it forces you to push hard on the adapter and sometimes it doesn't seem to make full contact which doesn't allow it to charge. I'm sure it's part of the design and why it holds so well, but again a potential hindrance. Just monitor the light...
customer_reviews.author: J. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great mount when you receive a genuine one!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that have the broken mount are knock offs that get sent out occasionally. The genuine Scosche brand suction cups are sort of sticky and soft to the touch. If you get one that has a hard suction cup it is not a genuine one. Send it back and let amazon know that supplier is sending out cheap knock offs. The reason this gets 5 stars is because it is not scosche’s fault that people send fake trash in place of a great mount!
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: This Last One Is A Dud
customer_reviews.text: I've used scosche magnet mounts for a while now, and have never had a problem with them. The last one I bought, however, has been a major disappointment. The large magnet plate that attaches to the phone case is significantly smaller than it used to be, resulting in the phone falling whenever I hit a bump in the road. I ordered the same model from the same place, so unless I was sent the wrong item, this seems to be an extremely flawed design change. Looking to other solutions now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Mount and Charging Device
customer_reviews.text: The Scosche MAG12V is perfect for mounting my iPhone. It slides inside my lighter/power outlet and keeps my iPhone handsfree and out-of-way viewable. I have had windshield suction mounts and recently tried a dash mount (returned), but they were always too cluttered or falling off. The Scosche MAG12V allows me to use my car's lighter/power outlet as a stable mounting source and it can recharge my iPhone as well. You will need your iPhone's charging cord (not the AC plug though) to charge. Luv the magnet grip.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Last vent mount I try ever again
customer_reviews.text: I had big hopes for this magnet mount. From the reviews my expectations were high. Everything worked great... except it doesn’t work in my vents. The vents are too small. I can not return it for something different. I love the brand but not the vent mount.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: expected better
customer_reviews.text: i installed the mount on my truck dashboard Tuesday night. did everything by the instructions. that same night i attached the larger metal plate to my phone, again following instructions. Friday night i am driving down the turnpike, phone was on the mount, 72 hours after installation. the metal plate separated from my phone sending my phone to the floor, plate still magnetized to the mount.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device holder
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I received it two days after ordering it and installed it straight away. It is the perfect size for my truck, sits in the perfect place and does not budge at all. My phone, in its case, sticks to the holder even on the roughest of roads. I couldn't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: RobertGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for large phone, buy 2x strength instead.
customer_reviews.text: Not good for large phone. My galaxy Note 8 continually fell during my commute on the freeway when big bumps occurred. If I weer stationary then I guess it would be fine but I bought for the car. Previously I had the same brand but 2x power and never had this problem. Suction to window was great, never wavered during two weeks I used. Returning and getting a 2x power one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Moersfelder

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect!! I love it and it really holds my Google pixel well without any issues using the larger magnet.
customer_reviews.author: KB RN

customer_reviews.title: It simply works and it's good quality
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. The suction cup is strong and sturdy. The arm bends in any direction you want and it holds firm. The magnetic mount is strong and secure and it has a rubber pad to keep the phone from sliding off. It does not work through my phone case but if you put the metal piece directly on the magnet then it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this purchase. This brand got stellar reviews from some family members and I really wanted a smaller phone stand that would be out of the way in my car. I explicitly followed the installation instructions and was very careful so this would adhere properly. I even waited over 24 hours before finally trying it out, but within the first hour of using it the whole thing fell off of my dash. I tried adhering again using the replacement stickers it comes with and it fell off again. I purchased the suction cup version from this brand at target and so far it’s working great. It must be this specific model.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Pixel 3 with a Moment Len's case on
customer_reviews.text: It holds my pixel 3 with a moment lens case just fine. On hard bumpy roads it will move slightly but does not fall off. The bigger size magnetic plate I use works with the case not the small magnet it will not hold the phone with a case on. I would recommend this product for small thin cases like my moment lens case. I never tried it on a thicker bulkier case to say if the magnet will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to glass, holds phone. Doesn’t move Around.
customer_reviews.text: Phone holder, holds phone. Suction cup works and sticks well. Bought it for a 44hr road trip and preformed well the whole trip, even in the desert at 100+temps. Recommend. I bought this because I have the surface mount mag setup in my other cars. Suction works for rental/ work truck. & No it Doesn’t bounce/ move around.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Si

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected! It's as simple as it sounds. It's as great as the other reviews. My only concern was mounting into my radio trim. I abhor the idea of any sort of permanent installation. My solution was to apply a piece of blue painter's tape to my dash in the exact spot that the mount was too attached. 2 months on and it's holding firmly. Great thing is when I remove the mount later I can simply peel off the blue painter's tape and leave no evidence of its installation.
customer_reviews.author: SED6

customer_reviews.title: Put your phone where it does the most good.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that didn't block my air vent, wasn't stuck to my windshield or my dashboard, and this turned out to be a great solution. Just plug it in and you are ready to go. You will need to provide your own cord to run from the charger to your phone but those are cheap and easy to find. The goose neck locks the phone in tight, quick and easily but due the length, the phone does giggle around a bit but not so much that you can't read the GPS or touch a quick button. If it didn't giggle, I'd have given it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Improvement needed
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 7 months and the adhesion pad fell off 2 times in that duration. Magnets struggled to keep my phone in place steadily. After re-tightening the unit to try an improve the sturdiness of the unit, the threads have now stripped. I believe the product has potential and its design is great (which is why I am giving it 2 stars instead of 1,) but I would like to see stronger magnets and higher grade materials, even if at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the mount is very good. The arm is flexible
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the mount is very good. The arm is flexible, and doesn't shake while driving. Suction mount works very well. However, I placed the magnet inside my case, as instructed (a very thin and light case, mind you), and the phone came off several times when I went over minor bumps while driving. A great product if only it would hold. Also, if you plug in a charging cable, the phone will gradually rotate if the cable even slightly pulls on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rozenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great, but awful.
customer_reviews.text: The device itself is awesome; but falls over after about three days every time! I have an iPhone X with a light case on it, and the adhesive that it came with would not hold the stand to my cars dash at all. It's not even a harsh angle at all, almost 90 degrees. I tried double sided gorilla tape, scotch's version and a few other non-name brands and nothing held it up. It's not even summer yet and I know if it can't hold in 35- 50 degrees F it won't last in 85-110. Disappointed. Will have to get a suction cup version like I wanted to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: jdsamazonaccount

customer_reviews.title: Could have stronger magnets
customer_reviews.text: If this were used on a vent in my car it would block 25% of the available air flow which would not be acceptable in Texas heat so I managed to mount it on my cigarette lighter. It stays mounted well and I am very happy with that to put the magnets could be stronger despite the fact I am using a magnetic case in addition to the steel plates provided with the holder. Old phone phone for reference. It's got that broken screen mod. Lol
customer_reviews.author: robert paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for me, lacks pivot for those wanting one
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have one of a purchases where it works great and you never fuss or worry about the item again. Works really well for me because I don't use my phone much other than throwing on some tunes and the occasional set of directions. So I was looking for something small and barely noticeable. It has a much smaller profile than the previous vent magnet I owned, it's perfect for me. Those that use their device much more frequently and would like to pivot so the screen so it's is facing them may not like this, they may want one that has a ball joint.
customer_reviews.author: doc n.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know what I did before I had this!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use the maps app on my phone a lot, so I like being able to see it easily, hands-free. I have the magnet on behind a case and it’s still strong. It has never fallen off, even when my coiled charger cord tugs on it. Just be careful if you use this with the heat in your car turned on. Got some overheating warnings on my phone until I started remembering to take my phone off the mount when I had the heat cranked up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandic

customer_reviews.title: Mount is wobbly and unstable after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (12/18/18) this mount to be used in my vehicle when I work Uber and Grub Hub. It functioned great for the 4 months I had it mounted to the windshield, and when the hot weather months rolled around, it got more exposed to the suns rays. 2 months later the mount became wobbly and is coming apart. I thought the Scosche brand was good quality, but not this time around. This item is Junk and not worth the investment if you drive and use a mount for your job.
customer_reviews.author: BEAR

customer_reviews.title: Great product - right now I have three
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mount, and have one in each of our family's three cars. The only downside is that the suction cups evently lose suction power and won't stay on the windshield. If you clean the glass and the cup with something like Windex, they can be re-installed for some time but eventually they do give up entirely. Then I just attribute it to normal wear and tear like any other car part and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: EarlyTechAdopter

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase with this vendor but my second purchase of this product. I liked having it up high in the rearview mirror. The only thing I didn't like was that the foam pieces compressed after several weeks. The device/clamp would not hold and fell off. It's no fault of the vendor. The manufacturer is to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Fdub

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: Tried another brand just like it from our local auto supply. Broke it just bending it to mount it in the auto supply parking lot so returned it right away. We had the Scosche in another vehicle so I just ordered another one for my car. Works great and holdes the phone better than the other one would have. I noticed the magnets on this one are stronger.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a Scosche mag mount on the dash of my car and bought this vent mount to put in my pickup truck. Unfortunately, there are no adjustments on this mount and nothing but the vent prongs to hold it in place. So if your vents are recessed even a little bit your phone will hit the dash and will have on movement. I will probably not use it and it will cost to send it back, so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: DHBRef

customer_reviews.title: Works best on side windows
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep my phone on the side window portion that does not go up or down... formerly known as a cigarette window. This unit sticks there faithfully, attaches and holds my phone reliably and keeps it in a place that does not interfere with vision in any way. Yet, it's close and handy. I give it five stars for always doing what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: John Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like to dock my phone while in my car when using GPS or listening to music. This product has held up strong with constant use. It has been a life saver!! My phone is rather heavy with its case on and I was worried the magnet would not be strong enough to work through my case and hold the phone steady but it does. It makes it so convenient to just slap my phone up once i get in and grab it and go. I actually ended up getting another one for my other cars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the packaging is well made! The product is awesome and it's great price! It comes with one large and one small strong magnet I feel that's a bonus. I can probably use the small one for my iPod. If I don't need to use my phone as a gps, I can just put my iPod on the vent mount. Someone suggested nice ideas about just putting the magnet between the case and the device, which worked out nicely! Highly recommended to get this great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Non-adhesive mirror mount doesn't block air vent
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like how this product securely attaches to just about anything mirror without adhesive. And the magnet allows for quick and easy phone attach/detach capability. And it doesn't block my air vents. Not sure if anyone else had an issue with wireless phone charging, but it seemed to interfere. I had to remove my case to properly charge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Will bobble out of the 12v socket while driving
customer_reviews.text: The magnet and arms work great; the magnet is strong enough that it clamps my cellphone though the case and the arm is long enough to be able to bend to the desired position. The 12v plug is tight at first but when driving it will bobble out of position and loose the power connection so you have to continuously shove it into the plug to keep the connection for charging
customer_reviews.author: Chantil

customer_reviews.title: Superior magnet, best choice
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned two of this specific unit. After several years of use everything still holds up. The magnetism of the unit is superior to cheaper units. The magnetic is also padded with a fine film of rubber that prevents your device from slipping off the mount on rough roads. I loved our first one soo much I bought a second for my mother and they are both still in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Refuse to stay in place no matter what!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stick-on version of this product years back for my truck and it works like a champ! My husband didn't want something "permanent" in his vehicle so I opted for this suction model. What a mistake! I followed the included instructions to a "T" and these absolutely refused to stick to any surface. I'm returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P. Waldeck

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Keeps phone/gps where you need it. Get a longer charging cord if you do not use speakerphone. Comes with a short cord. Wireless charger will not work with metal plate attached UNLESS you follow directions. Read the directions before mounting the metal plate for magnet.
customer_reviews.author: ....ANON..MOUS

customer_reviews.title: Much Sturdier Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: My one fear with this was that my phone would fall from the mount when hitting bumpy roads, and that has yet to happen. I've used it with a galaxy s8 in a case with a built in magnetic plate and I've also used it with an iPhone 6s Plus where I've just slipped the included magnetic plate in between the phone and the case. The only problem with the latter is that the phone has a tendency to slide around more since the plate isn't being held in place by either the phone or the case. My solution was to just go ahead and stick the plate to the back of the case. No problems ever since.
customer_reviews.author: James N

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Ended up breaking my air vent with this device. Also, I installed the metal plate inside of my phone case as to not ruin the case or my phone. My phone tended to slide off of this device. I haven't had issues with any other magnetic mounts with the plate inside my case. It may be due to the texture of this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

customer_reviews.title: very convenient - I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I mounted mine on my drivers side window (the corner panel by the windscreen). First thing I do is stick my phone navigation GPS up there and it's right there for me to see the map. The metal piece that sticks to the magnet is very thin adheres to the inside of your phone cover - it's so thin you don't even know it's there. (magnet does not hurt your phone). I bought one for my gf and she uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Plano, TX

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work Properly...
customer_reviews.text: Did not stick at all. I had the same one before, but I bought it from a Sprint store. It was expensive there. I took it off to move it because I didn't like where it was... I never should have done that. I ended up buying one from Best Buy and it's awesome. Both Sprint and Best Buy had this product, and it worked excellent!! I have no idea why the Amazon one did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: (Bought the dash model) Fantastic. I’m an aggressive driver, this phone doesn’t move. The mount isn’t moving either. I placed it a little off center on my dash. Tried to take it off... yeah not happening. Sticks to my dash like glue. I have a Ridged dash. & it still sticks. I’m very very impressed. I will buy again. If need be. But I don’t think I’ll need to purchase again. Highly recommend. 👌🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely better then advertised. Came with it’s own little metal sticky things for the back, adjusts to fit my stupid rear-view mirror. I LOVE how the phone is easily accessible. I’m buying more. The best mount I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: ClAy

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great but magnet not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: The magnet isn't strong enough to be placed between the phone and a case. It's strong enough for the phone to stay up while the car is stopped, but the vibrations and bumps from driving make the phone slide down crooked then eventually fall off. If you have the kind of case that the magnet will stick to, you could put the magnet directly on the back of the case and I'm sure it would work great.
customer_reviews.author: RedFlamel

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Co-worker bought a couple of these for our work truck, was impressed enough to buy one for my car and remove the old vent mount one I had been using as it didn't work so well because the springs wore out (which I found out later was made by this same company).
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: MAG12V this thing killed two birds with one stone
customer_reviews.text: I needed a phone holder for my Kia Forte but I couldn't find anywhere to put the regular dash mount with adhesive backing. I wanted the 12V to act as a Phone charger and this thing killed two birds with one stone. At the beginning I was very skeptical but now that I tried it I'm very pleased with the product, holds the phone very firmly and it has very high build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.  Until you get a folio/flip wallet case
customer_reviews.text: This mount is great. It holds your device well, even with bumpy city pothole infested streets. The only challenge with this mount is: This mount does not work with folio/flip wallet style cases that have thick material. The tick material used to make the case does not allow the magnet to have a strong hold of the case. Any minor bumps are left or right turns and your device will fall off of the mount.
customer_reviews.author: MOBirdies

customer_reviews.title: While I love the product the shipping sucked
customer_reviews.text: While I love the product the shipping sucked. USPS left my parcel in the wrong postal lock box. The key they left me wouldn't open any of the lock boxes. If it hadn't been for my honest neighbor who actually received my parcel and came over to give it to me I would not have received it. My neighbor was more displeased than I as I'm sure his parcel was delayed by USPS too.
customer_reviews.author: Martyn E. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Weak charger grip.
customer_reviews.text: The grip on the charger is a little weak. When my phone is on it, it turns when I make a turn in the car. If the grip was a little stronger on the charger it would be better so that the weight of the phone doesn’t turn it and knock my phone over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone GPS Travel Mount
customer_reviews.text: I travel very frequently for work and honestly, I cannot find my way out of a paper bag so a GPS is a MUST for me. This mount is small enough to take everywhere. I keep it in a little bag with a USB car charger and a cord. It sticks to the windshield easily and is easy enough to remove. It also has never fallen off as other mounts have done to me.
customer_reviews.author: kevba

customer_reviews.title: Truck driver approves
customer_reviews.text: Love this a lot, but at first i was worry about the size of my iPhone 8 plus being too big and because the magnet looks small but i was wrong the magnet is strong I’m a truck driver and where I leave there’s a few pots holes lol but it hold the phone no problem I think there’s nothing better in the market than this, great job guys.!
customer_reviews.author: iFROSTY

customer_reviews.title: Such a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, my boyfriend bought this after lots of research. We were sill skeptical about its effectiveness, but gave it a go. As soon and he applied the magnet and popped his phone on, he was thrilled. Now he can use his gps and speaker phone in his work truck without a problem. We’re buying another couple for our personal cars. This was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Candice M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the idea, didn't perform in reality
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are strong, no issues there. Flexible arm isn't long enough or strong enough for my use. The flexible arm is only about 3 inches long. The lighter socket in my Jeep is very low on the dash - I'm sure it may be fine in other vehicles. Arm began to droop first day and would not hold my phone where I would originally set it. Unable to continue use in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Stressless. Non breakable.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Using the magnet is effortless. No sizing or ratcheting fingers, no moving parts to break. Doesn't get any easier. Only regret was not buying the XL. Make sure what you buy will physically fit your application. Standard will due, but the XL would've been better. Didn't see it until after. Eventually all my vehicles will use this or something like it. Stressless.
customer_reviews.author: tackett2005

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best...for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE - Fast forward 4 years later...it finally just fell apart and is irreparable; question is...do I feel 4 years is a respectable life-span on this product at its current price - I'll just take one star away to make my point. Out of all the products that I have bought on Amazon in the last few years...this is the only one that I have bought THREE times! Forget every other phone mount...this is the one you want! It looks like its part of the car...the thick arm looks stationary, but it bends! Never drops your phone and easy as pie to mount! Simply the best...
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and holds a standard sized phone easily
customer_reviews.text: Car mounting doesn't get much more convenient than just slapping your phone onto a magnet. Holds my iPhone 7 securely even over bumpy roads and hairpin turns. I was concerned that mounting a metal plate on the back of the phone might interfere with reception or cause the phone to heat up more, but so far I have not experienced either of those things. Very happy with the MagicMount!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you are minimalist!
customer_reviews.text: I like the neat design, sturdy built quality and the suction is great. Been using it for a year and it has not once come down tumbling onto my feet with hard braking or extreme weather. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: SujD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, mount fell off adhesive, adhesive stuck on dashboard
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed when the back of my mount came off the adhesive over night, leaving the adhesive stuck to my dashboard. I don’t know what happened with this brand, but my partner and family members bought this mount last year for their cars and had no problem! They still use their mounts today! For me to finally be able to buy this mount for my own car and for it to just fall off without even a full day of use was just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Ruel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Super glue it down and it’s a rockstar
customer_reviews.text: Have been using their magnet system for years. Got this one for my wife’s car. My only complaint is I always have to find a way to anchor it with better adhesive because the supplied form of attachment won’t hold under the weight of a phone. ESPECIALLY on hot days, or when the heat is turned up. Once you get it to stay though it’s brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: JMelt

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, weak execution
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this mount. Unfortunately, when using it with my Nokia 6.1 with a silicone case, it had trouble staying in place with either mount backing plate; I wouldn't want to depend on it if I was using a tablet in a case. I'm using it and it works OK; I just wish the magnets were stronger to compensate for the thickness of a case.
customer_reviews.author: JFE

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold phone
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and is a perfect length for the Jeep. But... I'm not into my phone going crooked with every bump. More annoying, the phone drops right off the mount on at least 1/4 drives, at least once. I don't have a large "plus" phone or a big bulky case... This mount can not be trusted, I won't risk my phone dropping and being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D.

customer_reviews.title: iPhone falls off at the slightest bump
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all - doesn't hold an iPhone at all - it falls off at the slightest bump. Also, I sent SCOSCH support an email explaining the problem, and all they did was spam my email address. I very rarely get any spam, and the day after I emailed them, BOOM! - Tons of spam! I'd be VERY careful with these people.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Product changed or 1/3 are defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 in Aug of 2018, love them both, phone never fallen off, magnets super strong. Recently bought a third and magnet seems to be about half as strong. Also, after driving for about an hour the whole mount separated from the adhesive (the side attaching to the mount).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work through case
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this device. I received it today, attached the black plate to my phone, put my case on and that's where it went bad. The case creates too much of a barrier between the supplied plate and the magnetic mount. The phone just slowly slides off the mount. If it does stay, it doesn't feel secure at all. I can't imagine the phone staying put through a bump. I'm sure this would work well if you placed it on a naked phone or on the outside of a case, but that wasn't an option for me. instant return and highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Armando M. Yglesias

customer_reviews.title: ... say that it is by far one of the best mounts I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my truck and I must say that it is by far one of the best mounts I have ever used. It does move around slightly sometimes but not enough to really bother me. Other mounts that I have had were flimsy and broke within the first month. I've had this for some time now and I am about to purchase another one for my husband to use for our Uber/Lyft service.
customer_reviews.author: The Palmers

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works really great. The suction cup locks up tighter than any other mount I’ve used. The flexible neck vibrates some while driving, but isn’t too bad. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great.. for a month
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome but the neck on it gets loose at the base as well as the place your phone connects. I havent had it long and already its useless.. sad too because i loved this thing at first. Is there any type of waranty that would replace this SCOSCHE?

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This window mount is great! It has been in my truck for several months and has held multiple sizes of devices including a Lumia 1520, LG G3, and iPhone 5 & 6s. The only time any of the devices have moved while attached to this mount is when I went off road on job sites, but even then, none of them fell, only turned upside down (top heavy because of metal plate placement in the cases) The ease of use for this mount is amazing. Just stick the plate on the phone (or in the case), stick the mount to the window, and put the phone near the mount. Physics does the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Austin F.

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep contact, keep having to adjust to maintain contact, electrical connection.
customer_reviews.text: The product in theory is great, once it's installed and the power outlet it tends to loses connection while going over bumps, railroad tracks Etc. I find myself having to adjust it all the time to see the blue indicator light come back on. If it would just maintain contact it would be an exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super strong
customer_reviews.text: I live in Panama where the roads are pretty bumpy and have lots of potholes and my phone have NEVER fall or even moved. This thing is amazing. Though I’d love to see some partnership with a case company to fuse the metallic piece with a nice cover so that it could look better.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as it's advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are not holding my phone, and I don't even have a heavyiest device. It's actually a PiXel 3 and it falls off every time when I mount my phone. It's not worth the purchase and I can't even return this product because Amazon is not taking returns anymore. Will have to reconsider what else we will buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Culacov

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mount. It attaches firmly to the windshield and it holds my phone up well without it falling or sliding and without me having to mess with trying to jam my phone into different holders with sides. To my surprise, it was very easy to take it off the windshield so I could use it in another car for a day. I love this mount and highly recommend it. Let's just saw I was very sceptical but it proved me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Y

customer_reviews.title: Strong Holding
customer_reviews.text: Keep your mouth closed this thing will pull your fillings out! I have a tablet that I attach to the dash and it holds in place. My phone is a prisoner of this device if it even gets close. And it makes a great radio micro phone holder too! Found that out by accident when it snatched the micro phone out of my hand. I will be buying more of this brand.....
customer_reviews.author: Gary Antley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but way too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product if you don't need to readjust it frequently. The flex neck on this thing is so stiff you can't really adjust it while it's attached to your windshield or dash. Other than that the magnets are strong and secure enough and the suction cup isn't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to the dashboard!
customer_reviews.text: It is not sticking to my dashboard. Followed mounting instructions to the T. It does look nifty and less obtrusive if it were to stick mounted. Now junk, would return if I hadn't junked original box already, so just trashed it too.
customer_reviews.author: TKM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for use with dash cam apps or navigation apps on phone
customer_reviews.text: I love how this comes with a plastic disk with 3m tape to go on the dash so you can use the suction cup on rough surfaces. I can take this and put it on my windshield in one car and on the dash in my other car and have no issues. I use this to hold my phone so my camera can see the road, because I use a dash cam app on my phone. It works amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Munro

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family has one of these and we all love it. The piece that adds to the phone is slim and doesn't hinder use or my ability to hold it. The suction on the base for the windshield is sturdy and has never slipped off by itself. Also, the arm on the base is strong and holds well. The magnet is strong and holds the phone secure in whatever position I put it in. Would definitely recommend. It helps so much, as there was nowhere before for my phone to be held up for directions.
customer_reviews.author: Manuela W.

customer_reviews.title: I use it.
customer_reviews.text: The metal plate needs installed outside of my phone case. If I install it inside, it does not work. Was a little disappointed that it takes away from my case but I love being able to have easy access to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Rylee

customer_reviews.title: Secure on mirror (Lexus) and magnet is strong
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I love this. I had one that seemed to shake loose around the mirror and had a clamp. This is so much easier to use. I was concerned that it wouldn't be secure on the Lexus mirror, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Meph2u

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I use this ALL THE TIME, and it’s great and so useful. The only downfall is that every so often when my phone is on there and I make a turn, the ENTIRE thing falls off and then it falls by my feet while i’m driving, which you can see being a pain in the you know what! Otherwise, pretty awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tanya F

customer_reviews.title: vent but they are at weird places in car or easily close so phone fails down out of reading range
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but impractical with most rental cars vent systems as it does not fit with the position of most vents. The products fits in the ;vent but they are at weird places in car or easily close so phone fails down out of reading range.
customer_reviews.author: Gibit

product_meta.title: Scosche MAGDM MagicMount Universal Magnetic Mount Holder for Mobile Devices, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Dash| Pattern Name:MountQuick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a new magnetic mounting system for conveniently mounting your smart phone and devices to the dashboard in your car, truck, boat or RV. Lock your smart device in place with this Scosche dash mount featuring a 4-Axis adjustable angle ball joint neck with lock for mounting in portrait or landscape orientation for optimal viewing from any seat. The integrated cable clip let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the mount keeping cables out of the way. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your device near the magnetic surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful neodymium magnets hold your phone and device securely in place even on the bumpiest roads and are 100% safe. The low profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the 3M automotive grade adhesive ensuring for optimal mounting. The magnetic connection allows you to rotate seamlessly between portrait and landscape orientation in a snap.
feature_bullets: Included Components: Mount, Stick Tab, Magnetic Stick Tab, Manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,618 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Magnetic, Weather Resistant, Swivel, Multiple Viewing Angle
